idea: Cedar Biosciences is a research-driven company focused on developing radical concepts in Science, Technology, Engineering and Medicine segments to fulfil unmet healthcare needs. Cedar’s scientific goals are to develop fool-proof technologies supported by strong IP, out-license IP to the global healthcare industry, foster effectual execution of novel technology and business ideas and develop viable commercial products and/or services.
name: Cedar Biosciences

idea:
We are into litigation finance. A third party who independently provides funds to parties for a dispute in exchange for a fraction of monetary rewards that is recovered from the proceedings is called Litigation Financing.

We also provide Lawsuit Analysis services to litigants to save the future cost of the litigants.

idea:
Welcome to KEEEL App - The New Zeal For Students, India’s Fastest Growing online learning program!

A perfect blend of E-Learning (Animated Videos) in Hindi and English, Teachers Video, Live Lectures, Books, Test Papers ,Unlimited MCQs practice, Doubt Hub, Exam Vlogs, Test Analysis and More to help students practice, learn and understand concepts in an in-depth and easy-to-grasp manner.

Boards and Classes

CBSE , ICSE/ISC & Maharashtra Boards - 6th to 12th Standards

The app covers Maths, Physics, Chemistry and Biology, Social Studies ,English Grammar ,Hindi Grammar ,Sanskrit Grammar for classes 6–12, students can prepare for competitive exams like JEE, NEET, and CET, Olympiads .

“Feel The Zeal Learn With KEEEL”
name: KRISHA'S EXCELLENCE EDUCATION E-LEARNINGPRIVATE LIMITED
